attributes.action: Fully investigate North Wales Police deliberately killing a dog on the A55
attributes.background: On February 22nd 2016, North Wales Police deliberately ran over and killed a dog on the A55 in North Wales, claiming it was the "only safe option", when the road in question is regularly closed / subject to rolling road blocks for much more trivial matters.

rejection.details:
There is already an investigation into this case. You can find out more here:

https://www.ipcc.gov.uk/news/statement-north-wales-police-referral-a55-dog-death-incident
